overview: The film begins with Ramu a valiant, son of I. G. Raja Shekaram who aims to be a police officer. But his timid mother Meenakshi disagrees. Meanwhile, Ramu falls in love with a beautiful girl Vani. Here Ramu makes a plan as if he is working in Vani's company and the name of the promotion, he leaves for police training. Apart from this, in a town called Nagarajapuram, three traitors make a lot of atrocities, Narasimham, Bhairavaiah, and Menaka, who behave like respectable citizens in society. These people perpetrate many activities such as smuggling, gambling, prostitution, woman trafficking, etc. Here no one dares to question them and any police officer who protests will be killed.
title: Aggiravva
